DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate sensitivity specificity Endotect compare ultrasound device flow-mediated vasodilatation ( FMD ) test .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation New Non-Invasive Device Detection Endothelial Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare result obtain Endotect result obtain brachial ultrasound FMD test , without nitroglycerin . The result 3 patient group ( see ) compare 1 : 10 subject , Half Endothelial Dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , Half endothelial dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , repetition test 2 : 10 subject , Half Endothelial Dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , Half endothelial dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , Repetition Nitroglycerin 3 : 10 subject , Half Endothelial Dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , Half endothelial dysfucntion ( accord previous ultrasound FMD ) , repetition test Endotect
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female age 1865 . 2 . Ambulatory 3 . FMD ultrasound assessment within past 6 month . 4 . No clinical evidence cardiovascular disease ( history MI , TIA stroke , limp , carotid aortic murmur ) 5 . 10 hour fast water 6 . Normal peripheral pulse examination . 7 . ECG without evidence former MI LVH . 8 . Capable understanding explanation signing informed consent . 1 . Below age 18 age 65 . 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Has FMD ultrasound assessment within past 6 month . 4 . Exhibits clinical evidence cardiovascular disease ( history MI , TIA stroke , limp , carotid aortic murmur , clot disorder ) 5 . Has eat drunk anything besides water past 10 hour . 6 . Known sensitivity NTG 7 . Takes medication asthma , heart disease depression , atenolol ( Tenormin ) ; carteolol ( Cartrol ) ; labetalol ( Normodyne , Trandate ) ; metoprolol ( Lopressor ) ; nadolol ( Corgard ) ; phenelzine ( Nardil ) ; propranolol ( Inderal ) ; sotalol ( Betapace ) ; theophylline ( TheoDur ) ; timolol ( Blocadren ) ; tranylcypromine ( Parnate ) , tricyclic antidepressant Elavil 8 . Anemia , glaucoma , take medication calcium channel blocker like amlodipine ( Norvasc ) , diltiazem ( Cardizem ) , felodipine ( Plendil ) , isradipine ( DynaCirc ) , nifedipine ( Procardia ) , verapamil ( Calan , Isoptin ) ; dihydroergotamine ( D.H.E . 45 ) 9 . Venopuncture arm within past week 10 . Use Viagra , Levitra , Cialis similar medication treat erectile dysfunction within last 24 hour plan use within 8 hour 11 . Any following : unstable emotionally unable understand explanation study ECG evidence former MI LVH . Abnormal peripheral pulse 12 . Has sign inform consent form . 13 . Patient enrol another clinical study .
